channel.title: How do I make the client connect to my ip?
channel.description:
Ok this is what i know, I have changed every damn thing that says 'localhost' '127.0.0.1' '0.0.0.0' to my server ip
right..
I know that on the source file, if you right click run and press edit and your server ip comes up or 127.0.0.1 comes up I know that on the clients file, if you go on to GUI and change were it says server ip-(my server ip)
this is from the source file on client textpad--->if (Server.equals("127.0.0.1") || Server.equals("localhost")) { what one do i change to my server ip?
but i dont understand why this wont work,
I change the 127.0.0.1 to my server ip in the RUN application in the SOURCE FILE And my GUI text pad thing has got my server ip in it and then i try and login to my server, trying to connect to my server ip and it will not work
My NO-IP DUC is open and my ip is ticked I have portforwarded on my router and i'm really stuck
SO BASICALLY THE QUESTION IS:- HOW DO I MAKE THE CLIENT CONNECT TO MY SERVERS IP

item.title: How do I make the client connect to my ip?
item.dc:creator: @Fatal_Desire Fatal Desire
item.description:
@Fatal_Desire wrote:

EGUI.Java. To change on the login box where it tells you what serv your logging into is. --> Client.Java–> Search “SetServ”–> Change to your ip.–> Save–> Compile. There ya go!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make the client connect to my ip?

item.title: How do I make the client connect to my ip?
item.dc:creator: @jrocky10 jrocky10
item.description:
@jrocky10 wrote:

Ok this is what i know, I have changed every damn thing that says ‘localhost’ ‘127.0.0.1’ ‘0.0.0.0’ to my server ip

right…

I know that on the source file, if you right click run and press edit and your server ip comes up or 127.0.0.1 comes up
I know that on the clients file, if you go on to GUI and change were it says server ip-(my server ip)

this is from the source file on client textpad—>if (Server.equals(“127.0.0.1”) || Server.equals(“localhost”)) {
what one do i change to my server ip?

but i dont understand why this wont work,

I change the 127.0.0.1 to my server ip in the RUN application in the SOURCE FILE
And my GUI text pad thing has got my server ip in it
and then i try and login to my server, trying to connect to my server ip and it will not work

My NO-IP DUC is open and my ip is ticked
I have portforwarded on my router and i’m really stuck

SO BASICALLY THE QUESTION IS:- HOW DO I MAKE THE CLIENT CONNECT TO MY SERVERS IP
